text.div:
HSPC Height Meas Associated Precondition

The conditions during which an individual's height was measured.

Copyright Statement: Intermountain Healthcare

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/observation-hspc-heightPrecond defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
84138 Height (body length) with shoes The individual's height was measured while the individual was wearing shoes
84139 Height (body length) without shoes The individual's height was measured without the individual wearing shoes.
84140 Height (body length) with patient reclining The individual's height was measured while the individual was lying down.
84141 Height (body length) with patient standing The individual's height was measured while the individual was standing up.

name: HSPC Height Meas Associated Precondition
description: The conditions during which an individual's height was measured.

concept.definition: The individual's height was measured while the individual was wearing shoes
The individual's height was measured without the individual wearing shoes.
The individual's height was measured while the individual was lying down.
The individual's height was measured while the individual was standing up.
